main: ^No, it’s a long story, I’m catching it for a… friend, I guess? He told me you guys are out here researching snails or something.
knot1: ^Actually, we mostly work with frogs. We specialize in herpetology. It was pretty impressive how you climbed a tree that tall to get that bugger. Have you caught any animals before?

c-0: ^Well, you’ve got talent, I’ll tell you that.

knot2: ^Yeah, I work at a local food spot.
knot4: ^My name is Sarah McGill. Come work with us at the wildlife center. You’d be out here in nature, researching and helping the local frog populations in a bunch of different ways.
knot5: ^Not good, unsurprisingly, but you get to spend all day with frogs. Are you even listening to me?
